name: WP-Ultimate-Map
author: WebsEfficient

sections.description:
WP Ultimate Map is wordress plugin which allows to group places with unique icons. You can group routes as well, You can place multiple places on map , you can draw multiple routes on map , You can draw a route and attach the places to that perticular route , It is very eye catching display of places and routes on the map. Filter the frontend view of the map according to custom taxonomies. Seo friendly places creation , search engines can easily crawl information about places. Placing a map on your website is very easy you can simply use a shortcode [umap].
All this functions helps you to attach your visitors Geographically with your website.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • Its very easy to place map on your website.
  • Its very easy to place markers and add places to that marker.
  • Drawing a routes by places.
  • manually drawing a routes on map.
  • Displaying a information about the place in infowindow.
  • Filtering the places by the markers.
  • Filtering the routes by the color.
  • Seo friendly

We are glad to hear from you. We would love to provide service for your wordpress site.

Visit Demo now Click Here
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugins
  2. upload and Extract files to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Go to backend and activate plugin and you are ready to go.
sections.faq: =No questions Yet= Don’t hesitate to ask.

short_description: Place a map on your wordpress website with custom markers , infowindows and Routes.
